humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor for both the right and left breast. For the right breast, the largest invasive tumor measures 0.8 cm, and for the left breast, the largest invasive tumor measures 1.3 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for both the right and left breast tumors is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size for the right breast is given as 0.8 cm, which falls under T1 category (T1: Tumor size ≤ 2 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T1.
